milestones.name: MVP - Core Functionality
milestones.description: Basic app structure and all four problem types working

milestones.name: Gamification - Practice Mode
milestones.description: Add scoring, timer, and basic achievements

milestones.name: Polish & Enhancements
milestones.description: UI improvements, extended achievements, visual hints

milestones.name: GitHub Pages Deployment
milestones.description: Set up automated deployment to GitHub Pages using GitHub Actions

milestones.name: Hint System
milestones.description: Add hint buttons with tooltips for all problem types

milestones.name: Set Challenge Mode
milestones.description: Replace Challenge Mode with Set Challenge Mode - pre-generated question sets with navigation, skip, and give-up features

milestones.name: Hints in Challenge Mode
milestones.description: Add hint functionality to Challenge Mode with limit (5 hints), point penalty (half points), and usage tracking

milestones.name: Test Celebration Buttons
milestones.description: Add 'Test Confetti' and 'Test Fireworks' buttons to allow manual testing of celebration animations

milestones.name: Multiple Choice Answer Format
milestones.description: Replace text input fields with multiple choice (radio buttons) for all problem types across all game modes

milestones.name: Fraction and Decimal Answer Format
milestones.description: Display all numeric answers (slopes and slopes in equations) in both fraction and decimal formats: 'fraction (decimal)' (e.g., '2/3 (0.667)') - Replaced by Milestone 15 (fraction-only format)

milestones.name: Complete Practice Mode Rewrite
milestones.description: Completely rewrite Practice mode code from scratch to fix multiple choice display issues and improve code structure while maintaining all existing functionality

milestones.name: Additional Problem Types
milestones.description: Add five new problem types: Finding Intercepts, Rate of Change, Identifying Linear Functions, Converting to Standard Form, with interactive graphs and table displays

milestones.name: Vertical Navigation Bar
milestones.description: Convert horizontal tab navigation to vertical sidebar navigation on the left, with responsive dropdown menu for mobile/tablet devices

milestones.name: Fraction-Only Answer Format
milestones.description: Display all numeric answers (slopes and slopes in equations) in fraction format only, without decimal equivalents: 'fraction' (e.g., '2/3' instead of '2/3 (0.667)')

milestones.name: Study Guide Aligned Slope-Intercept and Point-Slope Drills
milestones.description: Enhance existing problem types and add new study-guide aligned features: slope-intercept drills (from m and b, from m and point, graphing), point-slope form drills, two-point form conversion, parallel/perpendicular with graph labeling, absolute value graphs, and signed-number practice
